title: The Royal Manor
creator_credit: Frank Gardner and Central Office of Information
brief_description: A description of the English town of Richmond which is rich in historical and royal association. Shows scenes of Richmond Palace, Wick House and the Star and Garter Home, concluding with scenes of the Royal Botanical Gardens at Kew.
creator_credit_for_label: Frank Gardner and Central Office of Information
